title: U.S. consumer usage of mobile payments 2017
summary: This statistic shows , according to survey respondents , the U.S. consumer usage payments that should be addressed in the run up to the 2017 United Kingdom ( U.S. ) General usage ( as of 2014 ) .
With 64 % of respondents , Made_a_mobile_payment was considered to be the U.S. consumer topic , followed by the National Health Service ( Paid_a_bill ) and the Purchase_in-app_or_online ( EU ) .
gold: This statistic gives information on the U.S. consumer usage of mobile payment offerings as of January 2017.
During a survey of smartphone owners , 49 percent of respondents stated they had paid a bill via mobile .
